summary: Dr. Jesus A. Burbano, M.D. was charged with unprofessional conduct, professional/mental incompetence, and habitual abuse of controlled substances, stemming from being found unresponsive in an urgent care facility and self-prescribing benzodiazepines. His license was summarily suspended and then formally suspended for a minimum of one year, requiring full compliance with the Maryland Physician Rehabilitation Program before reinstatement.
